title: Evard's Black Tentacles
content:
Evard's Black Tentacles Level 4 Conjuration Spell 3~18 Damage 3d6Bludgeoning Tentacles sprout from the ground, turning the area into Difficult Terrain, attacking and Smothering creatures within. 10 turns 6m 18m STR Save Concentration Action Level 4 Spell Slot
